products.name: PlayStation 2 USB Modded Console
products.description: The PlayStation® 2 generation included giant steps forward in home console gaming, with augmented reality, online multiplayer gaming, and more ambitious, large-scale games on DVD discs. Offering users cutting-edge gaming, DVD playback, online functionality, and backward compatibility with original PlayStation discs, the PS2 console represented an irresistible package at launch and throughout its lifespan.

products.name: PlayStation 3 Slim 500gb ( Refurbuished )
products.description: The PlayStation® 3 era built on the legacy of previous generations with incredible leaps forward in online gaming and digital services, while the arrival of Blu-ray Disc games allowed creators to expand their ambitions and build truly immersive game worlds on a grand scale. The PS3 console delivered cutting-edge graphics, a robust online ecosystem, and multimedia capabilities that transformed the living room experience. As well as introducing gamers to incredible single-player adventures and revolutionary online experiences, PS3™ became an entertainment mainstay in owners’ homes thanks to new music and movie streaming apps, and easily accessible digital games via the new PlayStation™ Store.

products.name: PlayStation 4 Pro
products.description: Premium 4K gaming console with enhanced performance and graphics. Perfect for HDR gaming. The PlayStation 4 Pro brings true 4K gaming and enhanced performance to your living room. With 8-core CPU and 4.2 TFLOP GPU, enjoy smooth gameplay and stunning visuals. The 1TB SSD provides ample storage for your game library, and support for PlayStation VR opens new gaming dimensions.

products.name: Xbox Series X
products.description: The world's most powerful console. Play next-gen games with 4K resolution at 120fps. Xbox Series X is the world's most powerful gaming console, featuring a custom 8-core CPU and 12 TFLOP GPU. Experience 4K gaming at 120fps with ray tracing support. The innovative velocity architecture and 1TB SSD ensure virtually no load times. With Game Pass, get instant access to hundreds of games including day-one releases.

products.name: Xbox Series S
products.description: Next-gen performance at a great price. Play 1440p gaming with excellent performance. Xbox Series S delivers next-gen gaming in a compact form factor at an affordable price. With 8-core CPU and 4 TFLOP GPU, enjoy smooth 1440p gaming and up to 120fps. The 512GB SSD is perfect for your favorite Game Pass titles, and Smart Delivery ensures you're always playing the optimized version of your games.

products.name: Nintendo Switch OLED
products.description: Hybrid gaming console with stunning 7-inch OLED screen. Play anywhere, anytime. The Nintendo Switch OLED model features a gorgeous 7-inch OLED display with vibrant colors and perfect blacks. Enjoy the same hybrid gaming experience with portability and performance. Play docked, in tabletop mode, or handheld - the choice is yours. Includes improved audio and enhanced storage.

products.name: Nintendo Switch Lite
products.description: Portable-only console for on-the-go gaming. Lightweight and durable design. The Nintendo Switch Lite is the perfect portable gaming device. Featuring a compact 5.5-inch LCD screen and lightweight design, take your gaming anywhere. Play your favorite Switch games in handheld mode, with great battery life and durability. It's the affordable entry point to the Nintendo Switch ecosystem.

products.name: PS4 Slim 500GB
products.description: Compact PS4 with excellent game library. Great for budget-conscious gamers. The PlayStation 4 Slim is a smaller, lighter version of the original PS4 with all the same great gaming. With 500GB storage and a massive library of exclusive games, it's an excellent choice for budget-conscious gamers. Enjoy stunning graphics, exclusive titles, and online multiplayer gaming.

products.name: DualSense Wireless Controller
products.description: Next-gen controller with haptic feedback and adaptive triggers for immersive gaming. The DualSense controller revolutionizes gaming with cutting-edge haptic feedback and adaptive triggers. Feel every impact, vibration, and sensation in incredible detail. The built-in microphone, speaker, and touchpad offer new ways to interact with games. Experience gaming like never before.

products.name: DualShock 4 Controller
products.description: Standard PS4 controller with reliable performance and comfortable grip design. The DualShock 4 is the official PlayStation 4 controller, featuring dual vibration motors, a sensitive touchpad, and convenient share button. The ergonomic design fits comfortably in your hands for extended play sessions. Compatible with PS4 and supports a wide range of games.

products.name: Xbox Wireless Controller
products.description: Precise and responsive controller with 40-hour battery life. Perfect for Xbox and PC. The Xbox Wireless Controller features premium build quality and responsive controls. With up to 40 hours of battery life, you'll have weeks of gaming before needing to recharge. Works seamlessly with Xbox consoles and Windows PC, making it the versatile choice for gamers.

products.name: HDMI 2.1 Cable Premium
products.description: High-speed HDMI cable supporting 4K@120Hz. Certified and durable construction. This premium HDMI 2.1 cable supports the latest 4K gaming at 120fps. With certified construction and superior shielding, you'll get pristine video and audio quality. Perfect for connecting your gaming console to modern displays with minimal latency.

products.name: PS5 NVMe SSD 1TB
products.description: Sony-approved NVMe SSD for PS5 storage expansion with high-speed performance. Expand your PS5 storage with this Sony-approved 1TB NVMe SSD. With 7000MB/s read speeds, you'll experience lightning-fast game loading and minimal installation times. Easy installation with step-by-step guides included. Future-proof your gaming with extra storage.

products.name: Gaming Mouse 16000 DPI
products.description: High-precision gaming mouse with customizable DPI and RGB lighting. Experience competitive gaming with this high-precision mouse featuring up to 16000 DPI sensitivity. Customize every aspect with RGB lighting and programmable buttons. The ergonomic design ensures comfort during marathon gaming sessions. Perfect for FPS, MOBA, and RPG games.

products.name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard RGB
products.description: Professional mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting and programmable keys. Dominate with this professional-grade mechanical keyboard. Cherry MX mechanical switches provide responsive tactile feedback. Fully programmable RGB backlighting with macro support. Built for competitive gaming and long typing sessions. Includes detachable USB-C cable.

products.name: 144Hz Gaming Monitor 27 Inch
products.description: High refresh rate gaming monitor with IPS panel for smooth competitive gaming. Gain the competitive edge with this 144Hz gaming monitor. The IPS panel delivers vivid colors and wide viewing angles, while the 1ms response time ensures razor-sharp responsiveness. Perfect for competitive shooters, MOBAs, and fast-paced games. Includes adjustable stand and AMD FreeSync support.

products.name: 4K Gaming TV 55 Inch HDR
products.description: Premium 4K TV with HDMI 2.1 and 120Hz support for next-gen console gaming. Transform your gaming room with this stunning 4K TV featuring HDMI 2.1 connectivity and 120Hz refresh rate. Enjoy next-gen console gaming at its finest with 4K resolution, HDR support, and minimal input lag. The quantum dot technology delivers exceptional color accuracy and brightness.
